ingredients: 1 (8.5 ounce) package coleslaw mix, 1 (15 ounce) can crushed pineapple, drained,   +   1/2 cup finely chopped onion,   +   1/2 cup mayonnaise,   +   1/4 cup apple cider vinegar, 2 tablespoons brown sugar, 1 teaspoon dried cilantro,   +   1/2 teaspoon salt,   +   1/4 teaspoon ground black pepper
nutrition: Total Fat 6g 8%, Saturated Fat 1g 5%, Cholesterol 4mg 1%, Sodium 116mg 5%, Total Carbohydrate 8g 3%, Dietary Fiber 1g 2%, Total Sugars 6g, Protein 0g, Vitamin C 8mg 40%, Calcium 15mg 1%, Iron 0mg 1%, Potassium 75mg 2%
